#summary User Guide

=== Installation ===
Download the [http://code.google.com/p/gtalk-eclipse-plugin/downloads/list com.gtalk_1.0.0.jar] file and place the downloaded jar file in *plugins* directory of your eclipse installation. Then restart your eclipse. 

=== GTalk View ===
Go to *"Window > Show View > Other..."*, then select *GTalk* view from *GTalk* category.
